table.SQL_SELECT_LIST:
declare @totalItem int, @totalPage int set @totalItem = (select count(0) from wcms_SubscriberEmail { where SubscriberEmail_Email <o> @Search:SubscriberEmail_Email }) if (@pageSize < 1) set @pageSize = 10 set @totalPage = ceiling(@totalItem * 1.0 / @pageSize) if (@pageIndex < 1) set @pageIndex = 1 if (@pageIndex > @totalPage) set @pageIndex = @totalPage
select [SubscriberEmail_ID] ,[SubscriberEmail_Email] ,DATEADD(hour, {@TIMEZONE}, SubscriberEmail_Date) as [SubscriberEmail_Date] ,case when [SubscriberEmail_A] = 1 then 'checked' else '' end as [SubscriberEmail_A] ,0 as [locked] from ( select top (@pageIndex * @pageSize) ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY {@Sort} {@Asc}) as [num] ,[SubscriberEmail_ID] ,[SubscriberEmail_Email] ,[SubscriberEmail_Date] ,[SubscriberEmail_A] from wcms_SubscriberEmail { where SubscriberEmail_Email <o> @Search:SubscriberEmail_Email } ) tb where [num] between (@pageIndex - 1 ) * @pageSize + 1 and @pageIndex * @pageSize select @totalItem, @pageSize, @pageIndex
